title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 361.5 - Voluntary participation in case management activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 361.5 - Voluntary participation in case management activities

State Regulations
A social services district may not impose, or threaten to
impose, fiscal or other sanctions on an adolescent who refuses to participate
in case management activities or refuses to be referred to or receive the
services or assistance identified in his or her personal plan as necessary to
maintain and strengthen family life and/or to attain or retain the capability
for maximum self-support and personal independence, except when the law
otherwise requires participation in programs in order to receive public
assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
361.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
